name: WordPredictor
0:
”Alexa open guess my word”
”seven”
”my word starts with sa”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: guess my word
des:
User is required to think about a word in english language. To make the prediction, Alexa expects some inputs from the user including the number of characters in the word and the starting two characters of the word. Based on theset inputs, Aexa will guess the word by asking a series of questions which require yes or no confirmation from the user.
Courtesy:datamuse API
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
